description:
💘💘💘❀ Pet Inn ❀ - What could be more adorable than the fluffiest and cutest animals all living together in a skyscraper? 💘💘💘

『Declaration of love』Did you ever think about making a comfortable place for animals to come and relax together? Come and build a Pet Inn! ◕‿◕

In your inn, you can host all sorts of animals such as puppies, parrots, hippos, lions and even some mystery creatures. These adorable creatures will come to stay at your hotel while their masters are away. Use your experience and upgrades to decorate your inn, make it taller and make it more luxurious. As it becomes taller and taller, you will find out what famous monuments it has surpassed; and as it becomes more and more beautiful, the more pets will come to play at your Pet Inn.

➭ How to play

Use your imagination to build your own unique inn! Building and upgrading depends on your goals and interests. Each type of room is designed for a specific kind of animal; a panda will come to lodge only when a special room for him is built.  Can you guess what panda bears like the most? 

More rooms attract more pets; using your income you can build higher and faster in order to accommodate your growing number of clients.  Don’t forget to higher hire staff to provide even better service.  So what will you do with your Pet Inn?

➭ Visual effects:

Colorful and various backgrounds and figures with a warm and user-friendly atmosphere for the players.

➭ Sound effects: 

Every kind of animal and environmental sound to stimulate users’ interaction and creativity. 

★ 8 fantastic features ★
▪ More than 80 types of rooms in various shapes and sizes to choose from.
▪ More than 50 different animals to unlock. 
▪ What’s more: fun and diverse background music, and each animal has its own unique call. 
▪ Plenty of professional service staff to hire.
▪ Various fun rooms for animals to have more fun. 
▪ Distinctive pathways to connect the rooms. 
▪ Collect rent from rooms after a certain period of time, so you can upgrade the inn as you please.
▪ Unlock one or several new animals at each level. Compete with friends and see who can collect the most animal cards.
releaseNotes: fix the bug building new room requires expansion even there's empty space.
